Jo - det är problem för dom som tittar på Xvid i stationära DVD-spelare med DivX/Xvid funktion.

Det finns några få modeller på marknaden som faktiskt klarar Qpel - men inte både Qpel och gmc samtidigt.

"Officiella" släpp kodas aldrig med Qpel eller gmc. 

Personligen tittar jag aldrig på Xvid film/TV på datorskärmen (eller drar sladdar till TV:n)

Thanks very much for uploading. Good quality Xvid rips but unfortunately the settings used make them incompatible with all standalone Divx DVD-players. I would love it if people didn't use the standard setting of Xvid codec like 3 warp point GMC as there is no player that can handle these things (except for a modded xbox maybe).

In order to make a Xvid rip playable on all standalone divx dvd-players features such as GMC, QPEL, Packed Bitstream need to be turned off. 

Here is a screenshot of the settings needed to make a standalone divx dvd-players compatible Xvid rip. 
http://freeweb.siol.net/podtalje/vdub_compression.gif

The number of passes used for encoding doesn't affect the compatibility.
